channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Private Message
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Private Message

item.title: CVE-2023-0453|2024-08-02T05:10:56.352Z -- unknown -- wp%20private%20message
item.description: The WP Private Message WordPress plugin (bundled with the Superio theme as a required plugin) before 1.0.6 does not ensure that private messages to be accessed belong to the user making the requests. This allowing any authenticated users to access private messages belonging to other users by tampering the ID.
